title: Big City Living on a Small Town Budget !! Courtland Apartments !!
neighborhood: A Beautiful 55 + Community | Call for a Tour Today
posting_body: We are happy to provide IN PERSON TOURS with your confirmed tour appointment for anyone looking to call Courtland Place and Rainier Valley home.
Call or message us to schedule a viewing TODAY !!
See, Sign and $ave...$45.00 application fee, a $500.00 security deposit and 1st months rent move you in.
***ONE MONTH FREE WITH A 12 MONTH LEASE***
Important Deets:
Availability - Now (Sign for immediate Move-in or for as late as 8/15/2022)
Pets: Kitties and Small Dogs (Max - 40 #)
** Leasing options: 12 month Leases currently offered
** Apply for $45 per prospective resident
Holding Deposit: $400.00 (One bedroom) $500.00 (Two Bedroom)
Appliances: W/ D outlets in select apartments, all new refrigerators and stoves
Utilities Cost: Independently billed - Electric | WSG included
Parking type: Outdoor Parking Street Parking (Free)
Parking type: Garage - (Free) Waitlist only
Exterior: Balcony/patio select apartments
Wired for: Cable-ready, High-speed internet
Limited Entry Access: Elevator, Controlled access, Disability access
Our Flat features a Galley Style Kitchen, all new Floors, Appliances and Abundant Natural Light.
This is a Rainier Valley Gem.
Our Amazing TWO BEDROOM APARTMENT is OUT THE DOOR AT ONLY $1152.00.
Pick-up the phone and confirm a showing that best meets your busy on the go schedule.
Have further questions ??
Please inquire with our friendly team before joining us for an on-site walk-about.
Courtland Place at Rainier Court
3621 33 Ave S
Seattle, Washington 98144
